Meta_Tags.title: Filo | Italian Tech Atelier
Meta_Tags.description:
Filo s.r.l. is an Italian Company on the IoT field based in Rome, Italy.
We program, develop, build and sell products that helps people in their daily life hobbies.

Top_Slider.description_0: Filo is here to help you find everything matters.
Top_Slider.description_1: You will not waste time looking for your keys anymore.
Top_Slider.description_2: Drop it in your purse or put it in your wallet and do not forget anything anymore.

Filo_Description.description: Filo is a small device that helps you to never forget or lose what matters most to you, with a simple app on your phone.

Bottom_Slider.description_0: Insert Filo into your wallet and use the Filo app to locate it by making it ring or check where you last left it behind on the map.
Bottom_Slider.description_1: Attach Filo to your bag and activate the Comfort Zone. Be notified on your phone the moment you leave your bag behind.
Bottom_Slider.description_2: Simply press twice the button on Filo and your smartphone will ring, even when itâ€™s in silent mode.
Bottom_Slider.description_3: Attach Filo to your keys and pair it with the Filo app on your phone. Now you can easily ring your keys and find them fast.
